page.title: 16PRIZE GIVING AT SCHOOL
page.content: The junior school did a musical called Ramu.We sang lots of songs and people played instruments in time to the music.The recorders played two songs before we began the musical. We had prizes for what we during the year,like swimming,sport,attendanes and some people had a prize for passing their bike test. The infants sang a song called Donkey Riding and they also said a long poem called Vespers. They had prizes for sport and attendance. Lots of people came to watch both performances.
